Articles.Content: Now that I have a better understanding of the game, I reset it. In this career mode, im starting with $500,000 and 120 science. The one thing different that I'm doing is that I will only use vehicles that take off horizontally from the air strip! That is the challenge I face. The only vertical take off I did was to get the initial contract satisfied.
Search for the "Wrong Brothers" to find the story of someone before you who took that path.
Cantab, thanks I will. So far it is fun, but I have not orbited the planet yet.
